name: Pazing By (擦魂而過)
description:
DEMO for HTML5 (Download it for better performances!)

可以於此網站遊玩測試版（建議下載遊戲以得到更好體驗！）

Keyconfigs are listed below 按鍵設定可於下方觀看

A bullet-hell+2D platformer game  ,  no  weapons to deal with enemies.

一款彈幕+2D平台遊戲，角色並沒有任何主動武器來應對敵人。

The only way to eliminate enemies is by grazing their bullets (or their bodies)! This drains the enemy's health and recovers yours.

唯一可以「攻擊」敵人的方法就是－擦過敵人的子彈或身體來傷害敵人並同時為自己回復。

Graze: Stay near enemy bullets/enemy bodies and pass by.

Also you can use your cute pet: Mini-soul to "EAT" those bullets.

當然你可以使用你的迷你同伴來「吃」掉敵人的子彈。

Still too challenged and your friend is willing to help? You can turn ON partner mode, so two of you can be controlling (protagonist) and Mini-soul respectively to beat the game together!

還是覺得太有挑戰性而你的朋友想要幫忙？你可以在設定裡開啟同伴模式！一位控制主角，另一位控制同伴，令大家更容易通過遊戲！

Current Version: DEMO (With two easiest stages containing five scenes only)

(Some functions are disabled in DEMO, but will be released later on, be patient~)

Keyboard Control: (Default Setting)

  • WSAD: Up/Down/Left/Right Movement
  • G: Jump/Confirm
  • H: Use pet/Cancel
  • J: Floating(After beating the game)
  • ESC: Pause game
  • Key Numpad 8246: Partner Mode’s Pet Movement

鍵盤設定：（預設鍵）

  • WSAD：上下左右移動
  • G：跳／確定
  • H：使用寵物／取消
  • J：浮起（遊戲完結時獲得）
  • ESC：暫停遊戲
  • 數字鍵 8246：同伴模式下的寵物移動

Gamepad Control: (Default Xbox Setting)

  • A: Jump/Confirm
  • X: Use pet/Cancel
  • R1: Floating(After beating the game)
  • Start: Menu/Skip dialogue
  • Right D-Pad: Partner Mode’s Pet Movement

控制器設定：（預設XBOX鍵）

  • A：跳／確定
  • X：使用寵物／取消
  • R1：浮起（遊戲完結時獲得）
  • Start：暫停遊戲
  • 右邊D-Pad：同伴模式下的寵物移動
